text: Manasseh gu daaligi ana daangada dogologo ala nadau ihala ai, ala guu hali nadau dodo i hongo nia ala i Jerusalem. Mee guu hai nia mee aanei ngaadahi mo dana hai ne dagi nia daangada o Judah gi lodo di hai daumaha ang gi nia balu god, ga hidi mai iei digaula guu hai di huaidu ang gi Dimaadua.
